fullFaq.q: Can I change companions if I don't feel a connection?
fullFaq.a: If a companion clearly violates rules or provides poor service, she can be replaced or canceled immediately. For personal preference changes, we cannot arrange replacements or refunds on the same day. Please contact us for assistance if needed.

fullFaq.q: Can I book 3P or group experiences?

fullFaq.q: Why can't I book on the same day?
fullFaq.a: Most of our companions have other jobs and need time to prepare. We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred time and companion.

fullFaq.q: Why don't you show faces in photos?
fullFaq.a: Many companions have other professional careers. To protect their privacy and reputation, we only show body and outfit samples, not real faces.
Please make sure you've added us successfully, then send a message or emoji to trigger a notification—we'll reply right away.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to {brand} (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company'). To ensure the safety and rights of both parties, please read and comply with the following terms:

sections.title: I. Health and Hygiene
sections.content: If there is intimate dating behavior, clients must complete bathing and oral hygiene before the scheduled service and truthfully disclose their health status. If a client has a fever, respiratory infection, skin contact infectious disease, or sexually transmitted disease, or if our companion reasonably suspects such conditions, the companion has the right to immediately terminate the service. If any infectious disease or discomfort is discovered during the service, the Company reserves the right to suspend and cancel subsequent arrangements.

sections.title: II. Respect and Safety
sections.content: If there is intimacy, please respect women and take proper protective measures. Any refusal or forced engagement in unagreed activities will result in immediate service termination. Please trim long nails and address dry, rough skin conditions that may harm our companions. Any form of violence, pulling, excessive cruelty, SM equipment, or special behaviors not previously agreed upon is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: III. Privacy and Photography
sections.content: The use of any cameras, mobile phone cameras, or recording devices for photography, secret filming, recording, or eavesdropping is strictly prohibited. Privately obtaining contact information, inviting companions for outside appointments, or attempting to poach staff without the Company's and the companion's consent constitutes a serious breach of contract.

sections.title: IV. Service Eligibility and Behavioral Restrictions
sections.content: Persons under 18 years old (including high school students) are strictly prohibited from using our services. Service may be refused or terminated for those who are intoxicated, under the influence of illegal drugs, or deemed unsuitable for continued service. Members of gangs, criminal organizations, or the adult entertainment industry will be refused service. Any form of verbal abuse, discrimination, religious/political propaganda, or behavior that makes our companions uncomfortable is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: V. Cancellation and Change Policy
sections.content: Clients must notify us at least 72 hours in advance for any cancellations or changes to appointments. Otherwise, a fee equivalent to one service charge will be applied. If we need to cancel or adjust due to weather, transportation, or unforeseen circumstances, we will promptly notify you and provide a full refund or assistance in rescheduling.

sections.title: VI. Force Majeure
sections.content: In the event of force majeure (earthquakes, typhoons, epidemic controls, traffic restrictions, etc.) that prevent or interrupt service, the Company will not be held liable for breach of contract and will assist in arranging alternatives or refunds.

sections.title: VII. Personal Data Protection
sections.content: The Company will properly store and use your name, contact information, and identification in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act, solely for service-related operations. Without your written consent, we will not rent or transfer your data to third parties, and we commit to technical and administrative measures to protect your privacy.

sections.title: VIII. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Except as otherwise provided by law, the Company is not liable for damages caused by unforeseeable circumstances or non-intentional or gross negligence. If third-party claims arise from inappropriate client behavior, the client is responsible for and must compensate for related losses.

sections.title: IX. Service Refusal and Termination
sections.content: If a companion explicitly refuses any behavior and the client persists, it constitutes a serious breach of contract and may be illegal. If a client frequently changes or cancels confirmed times and locations, we reserve the right to adjust or terminate service. Any violation of the above terms deemed as 'inappropriate client' will result in immediate service termination without refund.

sections.title: X. Blacklist and Legal Liability
sections.content: Those identified as malicious violators, fraudsters, or lawbreakers will be blacklisted and permanently banned from using our services. If the Company or companions suffer damages due to client illegal activities, we reserve the right to report to authorities and pursue civil and criminal liability, including but not limited to seeking compensation for related costs.

sections.title: XI. Dispute Resolution
sections.content: In case of disputes regarding these terms, both parties should first attempt amicable negotiation. If negotiation fails, both parties agree to submit to the jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court as the court of first instance.

terms.effect: These terms take effect from the date of announcement. By using our services, you are deemed to have fully read, understood, and agreed to comply.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy applies to the website and related services operated by {brand} (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company'). To ensure your peace of mind, this policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Types of Personal Data Collected
sections.content: When registering and booking: Name, contact number, email, hotel or accommodation address, check-in/check-out dates, instant messaging accounts (LINE, WhatsApp, WeChat, etc.). When arranging itineraries: Travel needs and preferences (pickup time, location, special requests), payment methods and transaction records (cash, USDT-related information). When interacting with customer service: Contact records, inquiry content and replies, system-generated IP address, browser type, and usage records.

sections.title: 2. Purpose of Data Use
sections.content: We only use your personal data within the following necessary scope: Service provision: Booking confirmation, itinerary arrangement, pickup scheduling, and on-site assistance. Quality improvement: Satisfaction surveys, internal process improvement, and staff training. Customer service: Resolving issues during your use and providing real-time assistance. Marketing activities (with separate consent): Sending promotional messages and new event notifications.

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing and Third Parties
sections.content: With your explicit consent, the Company may share necessary data with: Partner travel agencies (car rental companies, hotels, private clubs, etc.) to assist with your arrangements. Third-party payment institutions (for USDT payment processing, currency conversion, etc.). Legal authorities (as required by judicial procedures to comply with laws or protect the Company's rights). Other parties with your consent. All partners sign confidentiality agreements and may only use your data within the above purposes, not for any other use.

sections.title: 4. Data Security and Retention
sections.content: Technical protection: SSL/TLS encrypted transmission, server firewalls, and regular security scans. Access control: Only authorized personnel may access data as required by their duties, with two-factor authentication. Retention period: Your booking and transaction data will be kept for up to three years and will be deleted or anonymized after expiration. Deletion request: You may contact customer service at any time to request deletion or correction of your personal data, and we will respond within a reasonable time.

sections.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: The Company uses cookies, pixels, or similar technologies to collect browsing behavior and preferences to enhance website experience and marketing services. You may manage or refuse cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect full functionality.

sections.title: 6. Minors and Sensitive Data
sections.content: The Company does not intentionally collect personal data from individuals under 18 years old. If minors are found to have provided data, it will be deleted immediately. Sensitive information such as health, ethnicity, or religion will only be collected and strictly protected within the scope permitted by law.

sections.title: 7. Policy Revisions
sections.content: The Company reserves the right to amend this privacy policy at any time. The latest version will be announced on the website and will take effect from the date of announcement. If changes significantly affect your rights, we will proactively notify you by email or phone.

sections.title: 8. Contact Information
sections.content:
